00136       bool operator == (const DistObj& elm) const {
00137          return ( m_distance == elm.m_distance );
00138       }
00139 
00144       bool operator != (const DistObj& elm) const {
00145          return ( m_distance != elm.m_distance);
00146       }
00147 
00152       bool operator > (const DistObj& elm) const {
00153          return ( m_distance > elm.m_distance);
00154       }
00155 
00160       bool operator < (const DistObj& elm) const {
00161          return ( m_distance < elm.m_distance);
00162       }
